sentences.en: Then some astronomers came up with the idea that atmospheric ammonia might have acted as a greenhouse gas.
sentences.cn: 后来一些天文学家提出，大气中的氨可能起到温室气体的作用。

sentences.en: To serve as responsible stewards of the planet, we must press forward on deeper atmospheric and oceanic research.
sentences.cn: 为了成为地球上有责任心的一员，我们必须推进对大气和海洋更深入的研究。

sentences.en: Franklin conducted his dangerous kite experiment in a thunderstorm, founding the science of atmospheric electricity.
sentences.cn: 富兰克林在雷雨中进行了危险的风筝实验，从而奠定了大气电学的基础。
